channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock market stages an epic rally. But volatility is likely to continue.
Why choppy bond yields are the hidden danger that could crush software stocks
Judge says White House can't ban Associated Press from Oval Office, Air Force One
item.description: Associated Press journalists were blocked from covering Trump events after the AP chose not to use his name change of the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf o...

item.title: Volatility ETFs halted as VIX sees biggest drop ever after Trump’s tariff pause
Dow books 2,900-point gain, Nasdaq up 12% as stocks soar on Trump's tariff pause
Trump tariffs: 'Do not retaliate and you will be rewarded,' White House says
item.description: President Donald Trump's tariffs on nearly all U.S. trade partners will drop to 10% for 90 days, but tariffs on China will jump to 125%.

item.title: Trump's 'reciprocal' tariffs plan kicks in; China vows again to impose countermeasures
item.description: President Donald Trump's country specific tariffs are in force, with trading partners continuing to respond.

item.title: European Union approves first set of retaliatory tariffs on U.S. imports
item.description: The European Union on Wednesday voted to approve its first set of retaliatory measures to counter tariffs imposed by the U.S. on steel and aluminum.

item.title: Trump temporarily drops tariffs to 10% for most countries, hits China harder with 125%
item.description: The U.S. stock market, which had suffered since President Trump unveiled his tariff plan, rose sharply after he announced a pause to allow negotiation...

item.title: Why bond-market tumult likely peaked this morning — before Trump’s tariff pause
